managementResponses.response:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your experience with us in downtown San Francisco. We're glad you were able to take advantage of the offerings at The Turn Cafe and also our fun throwback arcade area. We're surprised to hear your comments regarding the lack of an outlet in your bathroom. All of our bathrooms should have an outlet and we urge our guests to reach out to a team member for assistance if they are having trouble locating one. Until next time, travel safely and have a wonderful day!

review.title: Great location, good coffee bar. Arcade so awesome
review.reviewText:
The hotel is very central but it's chaotic to drive around there. The coffee bar was great for breakfast. My 8yr old son loved the retro arcade. 
I wouldn't want to be on the second floor next to the stairs though. 
The rooms were great for two people and super comfortable. There wasn't an electrical plug in the bathroom. It made blow drying my hair a chore.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Edy,

Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay with us at Axiom Hotel. We're glad that our perfect location was an added bonus to your excellent stay with us in the heart of downtown San Francisco. We appreciate your feedback on our bedding and understand that this is a personal preference. We will keep this in mind when making updates in the future. Our team is excited to have you back for another visit and we wish you all the best in your upcoming travels!

review.title: Great Hotel!
review.reviewText:
perfect location and great hotel to explore the city. as you exit the hotel you are right at the heart of the city!
very clean hotel, we had a blast!
review.positiveRemarks: location! location~ location!  very friendly staff!

managementResponses.response:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for sharing your feedback of your memorable stay with us at Axiom Hotel San Francisco. We agree that our location can't be beat. Our guests love being just steps from countless dining, shopping, attractions, and public transportation to all the local sights. We appreciate your compliments on our team members service quality and look forward to having you back for another visit. Have a lovely day!

review.reviewText: Lovely hotel in great location. Very friendly and helpful staff

managementResponses.response:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for sharing your review of your recent stay with us at Axiom Hotel. We appreciate your compliments on our newly designed accommodations in the heart of Union Square. We've worked hard to provide our guests with tech-savvy amenities such as device mirroring televisions, Apple TV, fiber-optic WiFi, Brita water filtration stations, and so much more. We're thankful for your recommendations to our future guests and look forward to serving you again in the future. Have a wonderful day!

review.title: Great Hotel in the center of downtown.
review.reviewText:
Hotel looks brand new and very modern with an untraditional reception. The room was very good and comfortable. Decent size for San Francisco. A bit of outside noise which is to be expected for this part of town. 
I would recommend
review.positiveRemarks: Clean and modern
review.negativeRemarks: Reception area is a bit weird.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Gcode,

Thank you for sharing your review of your memorable experience with us in the heart of downtown San Francisco. We're excited to read that our team is meeting all of our goals for excellent service and clean, comfortable accommodations at our convenient location in Union Square. Our guests love being able to explore all the local dining, shopping, and entertainment in the nearby area. We're glad you were able to take advantage of this during your stay as well. We're looking forward to you returning for another visit and wish you all the best along the way!

review.title: Nice Hotel and overlooking the Cable car turnaroun
review.reviewText: Wonderful experience and definitely comeback again.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean, modern, service was great and the food was delicious.
review.negativeRemarks: Letting the clients know which room faces Powell St. because some wants the view and some don't.
review.locationRemarks: The location was great. Close to bart, chinatown, right in the center of everything.

photos.caption: Is it weird I only snapped the bathroom?L

managementResponses.response:
Dear Thomas,

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us at Axiom Hotel San Francisco. We're proud to read that you loved every aspect of our hotel from our tech savvy amenities, comfortable bedding, in room mini fridge, carefully designed bathrooms, and Brita water filtration stations on each floor. We look forward to your next visit to the city and providing you with the same outstanding experience that you encountered on this occasion.

review.title: Such a unique and standout hotel!
review.reviewText:
I definitely loved my stay at the Axiom. The hotel is very attractive, trendy, and energetic. My room was small, but I was alone and it had plenty of room for just me. The bed was extremely comfortable as well. There was decent storage, a small fridge (so rare nowadays), a STUNNING bathroom, great lighting and each hallway has a Brita water station.

There is literally nothing I would change about this hotel. I would absolutely not hesitate to stay here again.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Ian,

Thank you for sharing your 5 out of 5 experience with us at Axiom Hotel. One of our guests favorite things about our hotel is our fantastic location... just steps from public transportation and all the local dining, shopping, and entertainment that SF has to offer. We see that you were also a fan of this along with our clean, comfortable, and tech savvy designed accommodations. From our device mirroring televisions, lightning fast fiber optic WiFi, Apple TV, Arcade, and Brita water filtration stations on every floor... we've truly thought of it all regarding the modern traveler. We look forward to your next visit and until next time, travel safely and enjoy a lovely day!

review.title: Nice Hotel, Great Central Location.
review.reviewText: Very comfortable hotel, friendly, helpful staff. The double room we had wasn't huge but plenty big enough for two people and was quiet.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean, tastefully decorated rooms and very comfortable bed.
review.locationRemarks: Superb location, great shopping close by and plenty to see/do within walking distance. Wide variety of restaurants to suit all tastes and budgets.

managementResponses.response:
Dear chris,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback of your recent stay with us at The Center of Next... Axiom Hotel. We're excited hear that you found our convenient location perfect for exploring the city and taking in the local shopping, dining, and attractions that SF has to offer. We have shared your compliments on The Turn Cafe's bar and coffee with their team as further encouragement moving forward. Our team looks forward to your next SF adventure and offering you another excellent experience!

review.reviewText: My girlfriend and I had a great stay, room was a touch small but still a nice room and in a great location, not far from Union sq and the trolley right outside the door, cafe had great coffee and a nice bar to come back to after a day of site seeing, overall was a great experience

managementResponses.response:
Dear Jennintheyarden,

Thank you for sharing your review of your excellent stay with us at The Center of Next. We see that once again, our fantastic location was beneficial for exploring the city and all the local sights/attractions. We appreciate your shout outs to our team for going above and beyond your expectations and have shared this feedback as further encouragement moving forward. We definitely think you've earned some cool points after getting to experience our device mirroring televisions, Apple TV, lightning fast fiber optic WiFi, Arcade, Library, and so much more that we offer at Axiom Hotel. We look forward to your next visit and wish you all the best.

review.title: Really cool hotel!
review.reviewText: I could step outside into the humanity or hide from it in the hip atmosphere of the foyer(read: library). I'm pretty sure that I earned a lot of coolness-points for having stayed there!
review.positiveRemarks: The foyer/sitting room; the gal who worked at the cafe/bar; the guy who got me the perfect room!
review.locationRemarks: The location is perfect for the visitor who wants to be in the middle of a touristy area of San Francisco. Public transportation is super convenient..

managementResponses.response:
Dear DF,

Thank you for sharing your review of your recent stay with us at Axiom Hotel San Francisco. It's fantastic to hear that our convenient location, just steps from multiple outlets of public transportation and countless options for dining, shopping, and entertainment was an added bonus to your stay. We appreciate your compliments on the delicious variety of food and beverage at The Turn Cafe and are glad you got the opportunity to sample some. We do regret to hear that you faced a minor challenge with noise during your stay and are curious if you had the opportunity to reach out to one of our associates for assistance. We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again when travel brings you back to SF and wish you a wonderful day!

review.title: Good central location
review.reviewText: Trendy boutique hotel in a busy area in Union Square. Great location to shop and launch to other areas of San Francisco. Good food offered in the cafe. The only downside was noise. There was loud music playing at night while we were trying to sleep and there is a bust cable car stop right outside the hotel adding to the noise. Bring ear plugs if noise bothers you when trying to sleep.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for sharing your review of Axiom Hotel San Francisco. We're happy to hear that our team members provided you with friendly, helpful service. However, we do see that there was opportunity for improvement with our partners at The Turn Cafe. We have reviewed your feedback with their team to ensure this is improved upon immediately. We look forward to your next visit to SF and providing you outstanding, tech savvy accommodations once again.

review.title: Centrally located
review.reviewText: Staff was nice but was kept up by  barking dog one night. The cafe was serviced inefficiently and no refills on coffee.
San Francisco is a beautiful city with a terrible homeless problem. The streets are literally filled with homeless. I never really felt comfortable.

managementResponses.response:
Dear CM,

Thank you for sharing your review of your stay with us at The Center of Next! One of our guests favorite things about our hotel is our convenient location... just steps from public transportation and all of the local dining, shopping, and attractions that downtown SF has to offer. We're proud to read that our clean, comfortable, tech oriented accommodations were the perfect fit for your San Francisco adventure. We look forward to your next visit and providing you with another 5 star experience!

review.title: Beautiful boutique hotel in a convenient location
review.reviewText: The Axiom is a chic boutique hotel near Union Square in downtown San Francisco. It is beautifully decorated with clean and modern rooms, meeting areas, gym, a coffee shop and bar. You can pick up the cable car right in front of the hotel, or take a 20 minute walk to Chinatown.
review.positiveRemarks: The location was convenient and the rooms were beautiful.
review.locationRemarks: Union Square and shopping is very close by.    A short drive/cable car ride takes you to Chinatown, Fisherman's Wharf, and the Financial District.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to share your review of your stay with us at Axiom Hotel. Our team is pleased to hear that you enjoyed our comfortable beds and had an overall great experience. We appreciate your other feedback regarding your bathroom and have shared this information with our maintenance team so these items may be addressed moving forward. We hope to have you back on your next visit to Sf and wish you all the best in your travels.

review.title: Just a couple things
review.reviewText: The lighting in the bathroom is terrible when you're trying to do hair and makeup. Not enough light. The shower door didn't close all the way and leaked water from the back of the shower. Beds were GREAT!

managementResponses.response:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to share your review of your experience with us at Axiom Hotel. We agree that our location can't be beat, just steps from all the local shopping, dining, attractions, and public transportation all over the city. Our team appreciates your compliments on our well appointed, tech-savvy rooms and excellent service quality. Until next time, enjoy a wonderful day and travel safely!

review.title: Great location
review.reviewText: The hotel is in a great location. We were able to walk to a lot of things we wanted to see. Cool room and hotel decor and nice staff.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Gary,

Thank you for sharing your review of your stay with us at Axiom Hotel in the heart of downtown San Francisco. Our guests love our convenient location and it's excellent to hear that this was a major benefit to you as well. On your next visit, we recommend exploring our other room types if you are looking for a specific view or additional space to spread out. We hope to continue to serve you on future visits to the area and wish you a fantastic day!

review.title: Great location in S.F. Area
review.reviewText: Very convenient to all transportation. Hotel and room very clean and modern. Room was a bit too small with no dresser for clothes. No views except for other exterior walls.
review.locationRemarks: Right in the heart of downtown, at the turnaround for Trolly Car.

review.title: It was truly a horrible experience....
review.reviewText:
Ours was a short stay, (Me, wife and two older sons) for three nights. Check in was smooth. We reached the hotel around 7 pm. on 20th July. We were given a room on their 6th floor.
Next day early morning the power went off in the hotel and while electricity to the room was restored by late afternoon, the elevators were non functional for almost two whole days, forcing us to use the stairs for more than  4 times each day. Not what I would expect from a 4 star rated hotel. Overall, poor value for money.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for sharing your review of your recent stay with us at Axiom Hotel. We see that as many of our guests mention in their reviews, our excellent location was a huge benefit to you and your family throughout your visit. On your next visit, we recommend looking to one of our larger room types if you are looking for extra room to spread out. We are surprised to read that there was opportunity to improve regarding our housekeeping team and have addressed this immediately to ensure it is not an issue for any of our guests. We hope to have the opportunity to serve you in the future so we may demonstrate these improvements and our commitment to friendly, quality service.

review.title: Good location
review.reviewText: The location of the hotel was very convenient. It's 2-3 blocks walk to union square where most of the tour buses stop. There's a lot of good restaurants around. Room is too small though. Our glasses were not replaced during our 4 night stay and empty water pitchers were not taken out.
review.positiveRemarks: Location
review.negativeRemarks: Housekeeping. Size of room - too small for a family.
review.locationRemarks: Near union square, Major department stores. Lots of places to eat. There's a Walgreens nearby.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for sharing your review of Axiom Hotel. We are proud to read that our team members were able to promptly assist you with switching rooms upon your arrival and that you enjoyed an overall 4 star experience. We look forward to your next visit to SF and providing you outstanding accommodations once again!

review.title: Nice hip , new hotel
review.reviewText: Great , we arrived late and checked evening in rather loud room on powel street road , however when we discussed the situation with the staff quickly moved to more quiet room .

managementResponses.response:
Dear Kellyn,

Thank you for taking the time to share your review of your 5 star experience with us at Axiom Hotel in San Francisco. It's excellent to hear that our tech savvy accommodations built into our in-room technology made your stay convenient from our device mirroring televisions, lightning fast fiber optic WiFi , and room service request. We have shared your compliments of our team members internally and we look forward to your next visit to SF!

review.title: Clean,  great amenities and centrally located
review.reviewText: Loved this hotel!   Great rooms,  clean with excellent service and comfortable.   The automated service made relaxing a breeze and central location at a low price.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Virginie,

Thank you for sharing your review of your wonderful experience with us at Axiom Hotel. We're excited to read that our accommodations were perfect for you and your family and that your kids were able to take advantage of the arcade/game room on our Cloud level. On your next visit, we recommend looking into one of our other room types if you are looking for extra room to spread out. We look forward to serving you when travel brings you back to the city and wish you all the best!

review.title: Beautiful boutique hotel
review.reviewText: Great place, perfect location. Fun game/tv room for the kids. Room was too small for 4 travellers, like most hotels in SF!

managementResponses.response:
Dear Bernie,

Thank you for sharing your review of your recent stay with us at Axiom Hotel. Our team is happy to hear you were able to take full advantage of our excellent location in the heart of all the shopping, dining, and attractions that San Francisco has to offer. We are proud to read that our team members made for a memorable stay and look forward to being your hotel of choice on future visits to the city. Please travel safely and enjoy the rest of your Summer!

review.title: Great Hotel! Close to everything!
review.reviewText: Cable car is steps from the door. 1/2 block from BART ($9 ride from airport) . Great area to walk to all the sights including Union Square and Fisherman's Warf. Great food and entertainment very close. Rooms are a tad small, but priced accordingly. Staff is very friendly. Would definitely stay here again!

managementResponses.response:
Dear Marie,

Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star experience with us at Axiom Hotel. We see that you thoroughly enjoyed our tech-centric amenities from lightning fast fiber-optic WiFi, device mirroring televisions, Apple TV, arcade area, and Brita water filtration stations on each floor. We are proud to read your compliments on our team members commitment to excellence in service and are glad that you had plenty of time to explore the city from our convenient location. Our team wishes you the best in your travels and we look forward to welcoming you back for your next visit!

review.title: Beautiful hotel near cable car stop & shopping
review.reviewText: My family and I loved this hotel.  Amenities were beautiful, and the room was spacious.  Relaxing lounge space, and nice bar.  Staff was friendly, and helpful.  The location is in the middle of lots of shopping, and places to eat.  Cable car stop right outside the door.
review.positiveRemarks: clean & comfortable room,location, filtered water station in hallway, lounge space with games, TVs, and wi-fi, helpful staff, sleek bar w/ tasty food
review.locationRemarks: shopping, transit (bus, train, cable car), restaurants

managementResponses.response:
Dear Jeanne,

Thank you for choosing the Axiom Hotel for your recent visit to San Francisco while visiting your family members. We appreciate your compliments on our cleanliness and central location in the heart of downtown SF. We regret to hear of the challenges you faced with service at The Turn Cafe and have followed up with our team members so we may strive for improvement immediately. We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again in the future and wish you a fantastic day.

review.title: NICE HOTEL IN GREAT LOCATION
review.reviewText: JUST USING THE HOTEL TO SLEEP WHILE VISITING MY SON AND GRANDSON.
review.positiveRemarks: CLEAN IN A GOOD LOCATION
review.negativeRemarks:
WE WERE OVERCHARGED WHEN PURCHASING SOME BREAKFAST ITEMS.  VERY BUSY.  NO RECEIPTS
CASH PURCHASE.  AND IT WAS NOT VERY GOOD.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for sharing your feedback of your recent stay with us at Axiom Hotel. We appreciate your compliments on our excellent location and are glad this made navigating the city and exploring more convenient. We do regret to hear of the challenges you faced regarding the wait at check-in and noise from our housekeeping team in the morning. Our team does our very best to streamline the check-in process and your information is helpful to us as we continue to improve. We have also reviewed your comments with our housekeeping team to ensure all of our guests enjoy a comfortable stay. We hope to have the opportunity to serve you in the future and wish you the best!

review.reviewText: Long line at check in. Loud cleaning staff early in the morning. Good location, pleasant hotel just not a 4 star one

managementResponses.response:
Dear Amy,

Thank you for sharing your review of your stay with us in San Francisco. As a brand new hotel in Sf, we are proud of the commitment to excellence in service and quality, tech savvy accommodations. All spaces of the hotel have been carefully designed; from the Hallidie Library, Cloud, Arcade, Fitness Center, and guest rooms with lightning fast fiber optic WiFi and device mirroring televisions. We look forward to serving you in the future and continuing to exceed your expectations!

review.title: Wonderful Hotel
review.reviewText: This hotel and staff exceeded my expectations.  Great location!
review.positiveRemarks: Rooms are clean and newly renovated
review.locationRemarks: This was close to everything we wanted to do.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for sharing your review of your stay with us at Axiom Hotel. As a brand new hotel in the heart of San Francisco, safety is one of our greatest concerns. Our back entrance is lock protected with a room key card reader so only guests and employees have access. We do agree that our location is perfect for a quick step to multiple public transportation options SF has to offer. We are curious if you had an opportunity to explore the hotel, as we do offer several lounge areas including the Cloud, Hallidie Library, and a separate seating area for our guests at The Turn Cafe restaurant. We have received many compliments on the breakfast offerings at Turn Cafe and hope you have the opportunity to try a dish on your next visit. We look forward to serving you again in the future and wish you the best in all of your travels.

review.title: Back entrance too near Tenderderloin district!
review.reviewText:
Back entrance very close to Tenderloin  district but front entrance only steps away from Trolley
 turn-around. 
Perfect transportation.Hotel very old but upgraded.No lounge, restaurant or breakfast bar accomoations.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for sharing your review of your stay with us at Axiom Hotel. As a brand new boutique hotel in the heart of San Francisco, we have optimized our use of space to ensure all of our guests enjoy a comfortable experience. On your next visit, we would recommend one of our rooms with an additional seating area if you are looking for extra space. We appreciate your comments regarding the opportunity for service improvement regarding The Turn Cafe and have addressed this issue with their organization for immediate improval. We hope you will look to us for accommodations in the future so we can demonstrate our commitment to excellence in service and quality.

review.reviewText: Hotel is OK. Rooms very, very small. Staff not so friendly. They need to smile a bit more, especially at the bar area.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Philip,

Thank you for sharing your review of your recent stay with us at Axiom Hotel. We agree that our location can't be beat. Our guests love the fact that you can hop on the Powell Cable Car or BART right outside our front entrance. We're glad you enjoyed a quiet, comfortable stay in our digitally wired guest rooms. We've truly put it all at our guest's fingertips with device mirroring televisions, fiber optic WiFi, and Apple TV. We look forward to your next visit and wish you the best in your travels.

review.title: great location
review.reviewText: The hotel is at great location besides bart station. It is very easy to take Bart from SFO to get the hotel. My room is an inner room. It is quite because far away from the street. The wifi connect is good. The receptionist is nice and he allows me to check-in early.
review.positiveRemarks: location, nice art works.
review.negativeRemarks: it has slightly either toilet or pipe smell in the bath room. The good thing is not all the time otherwise I would have to ask a room change.
review.locationRemarks: Next to the Powell station. Moscone center, union square,... are all in the 5~8 minutes walking distance.

managementResponses.response:
Dear MM,

Thank you for sharing your review of your experience with us in San Francisco. We are excited to read that our perfect location was convenient for navigating the city during your stay. It's excellent that you were able to take advantage of the delicious food and beverage offerings at The Turn Cafe and we have shared your compliments with their team. We appreciate your comments regarding our front desk team's opportunity to improve on service and suggestions for local activities. We have followed up with our team to ensure we are providing all of our guests outstanding service and recommendations. Please let us know on your next visit and a manager will be more than happy to assist you immediately. We look forward to welcoming you back for another visit in the future and wish you a fantastic day!

review.title: The great, the good, the disappointing
review.reviewText:
The great: Hotel location (amazing!), modern rooms, the hotel bar/restaurant (fantastic happy hour special w/ handcrafted cocktails), 
The good: The cleaning staff were friendly and did a great job
The disappointing: Considering this is four star hotel, we found some of the front desk/lobby staff to be very amateur.  I had to call/ask several times for simple things to be done. They could provide no good suggestions for services/amenities in the area. I would have expected a higher level of service/more experienced staff at a four star hotel.
review.locationRemarks: Amazing location - walk out the front door and you are in union square!

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay at the Axiom Hotel Vince.  We are thrilled you enjoyed the technology that we have incorporate into our hotel and the location.  Sorry for the issue with the shower door...we are glad to see the team was able to fix it.  Hope to see you back again soon!

review.title: As close to downtown as you can get!
review.reviewText: Hotel was very new and clean! love all the tech stuff they have built-in the room!
review.positiveRemarks: You can mirror your iPhone or Android devices to the TV pretty easy. Docking stating and Bluetooth speaker.
review.negativeRemarks: the shower glass door doesn't close all the way but they fixed when I told them about the problem
review.locationRemarks: close by everything in downtown SF, you can pretty much walk to a lot of cool places!

managementResponses.response:
Thank you for your review of the Axiom Hotel Stephen.  So glad to hear you enjoyed the staff and location.  Our central location is a great base for having a fun weekend in San Francisco and we are glad you and your friends had a great time!  It's a fun city!

Hope to welcome you back again soon!

review.title: Great location and very modern rooms!
review.reviewText: I had a great stay this past weekend at the Axiom Hotel with a couple buddies of mine. The rooms are very clean and are equipped with new modern-esk furniture. Very convenient location with the bart station right across the street and tons of shops and malls all around the area. Front Desk staff was extremely helpful and friendly. Free filtered water and ice were available on each floor!
review.positiveRemarks: Location, cleanliness, free crushed ice and water, friendly staff, and reasonable rates.
review.locationRemarks: Bart station right across the street - 9 dollar bart ride from the airport (May 2016). Plenty of food and shops all in the same neighborhood.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your comments about your stay at the Axiom Hotel.  We hope that you had an opportunity to take advantage of the complimentary coffee and tea service available on the Cloud Level each morning from 6:30 AM - 9 AM.  Thanks again for the review!  Come back again soon.

review.title: Modern room
review.reviewText: Location is excellent and central. Comfortable but small room. I am a coffee drinker & there was no coffee in the room!!

managementResponses.response:
Dear SP,

Thank you for sharing your review of your recent stay with us at Axiom Hotel. We are proud to read that our team is meeting our goals for excellence in service. We agree with you that our location is perfect for being in the heart of all the food, shopping, and sights that the city has to offer. It's excellent that this was a convenience for you during your stay. We hope to have you back for another visit in the near future and wish you the best in your travels.

review.title: Great location and staff are very friendly
review.reviewText: Hotel location can't be beat. Rooms were small but we made it work. Staff was very friendly. Tons of food restaurants all around and great area for shopping as union square is a short walk.

managementResponses.response:
Thank you for taking the time to Review the Axiom Hotel.  Glad you found our location convenient for visits that include the Moscone Center right around the corner.  Thank you for the nice comments about the hotels cleanliness as well.  We will pass it along to our Housekeeping Team who will be very happy to hear it!

Hope to have you visit the Axiom Hotel again soon!

review.title: Nice hotel convenient to downtown
review.reviewText: Nicely decorated hotel that is convenient to San Fran
review.positiveRemarks: Convenience of the location, cleanliness of the facilities
review.locationRemarks: Moscone Center is only blocks away, very close to public transportation for easy in and out.

managementResponses.response:
We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Axiom Hotel.  We are extremely proud of the Fiber Optic Network that we have provided to everyone room of the hotel and throughout the Public Areas.  We are thrilled that you were able to take advantage of the lightning fast free wifi that this Fiber Optic Network provides.

Come back again soon!

review.title: Great Location, Small Rooms
review.reviewText: Location couldn't be better next to transit and close to Union Square, restaurants, and shopping. Rooms are small, some rooms incredibly so. Great set up for electronics with real high speed internet connections.
review.positiveRemarks: Location, internet connections.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your review of the Axiom Hotel Kathy.  We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay in the heart of San Francisco.  We hope to see you back again soon!

review.title: Great downtown location.
review.reviewText: Close to Moscone Center (for conference) and for downtown attractions and shops.
review.positiveRemarks: Location, staff, ambience, lobby cafe, etc.
review.locationRemarks: Very central for all of San Francisco's downtown attractions and shopping.

managementResponses.response:
Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us jt.  We value our guests feedback as it allows us to constantly work to improve the services we provide.  I am very sorry you had an issue with the toilet in your room.  I hope it will not leave an indelible impression on you of our hotel.  

Thank you for choosing the Axiom Hotel for your visit to the heart of San Francisco!

review.title: Excellent location
review.reviewText: Tiny room but it was clean and new.  The trolley stop is right in front which was super convenient.  The toilet leaked which we found later in the evening and the hallways could have been better lit.  Didn't use the valet. We self parked around the corner for half the price.
review.positiveRemarks: Location
review.locationRemarks: Shopping, shopping and more shopping.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Axiom Hotel Young.  We appreciate your kind comments and will share them with the Housekeeping Team.  I will also pass along the comments to the rest of the team.  Hope to see you back again soon!

review.title: Clean, clean, clean
review.reviewText: Everyone is different when they look for a hotel. I have OCD. I prioritize cleanness over any other things. The room, sheets, hardwood floor, and bathroom were all clean. No funky smell or a disgusting shower curtain. It was just like the picture. Staff at the check-in and cleaning crews were all extremely nice and professional. They were flexible with check-out time without any hassle as well. My room was small and no good views which was no problem to me. Great location, right in front of cable car stop and Powell station. I would confidently recommend to my friends and family. I will always go back to Axiom when I visit SF.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for sharing your review of your recent stay with us at Axiom Hotel. We agree that our excellent location is ideal for a short step to public transportation and the extraordinary amount of attractions, entertainment, and dining that SF has to offer. Our team appreciates your compliments on our brand new tech-centric hotel and are pleased to read that you enjoyed a clean and comfortable stay.  We look forward to offering you accommodations on your next visit to San Francisco and wish you all the best in your travels!

review.title: Perfect location,  modern and new.
review.reviewText: Great place to stay for a few in San Francisco.  Modem, clean and convenient.
review.positiveRemarks: Location
review.locationRemarks: Trolley outside the front door,  Bart station to airport also very close.  Shopping, restaurants within walking distance.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for choosing the Axiom Hotel for your visit to San Francisco.  Being centrally located in the heart of the city it can have a tendency to get a little loud.  We hope that you were able to take advantage of the sound reducing interior windows to help reduce the noise.  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us.  We hope to see you back again soon!

review.reviewText: Was great. A bit loud during the day but during sleeping hours

review.title: New hotel with friendly staff and a good vibe
review.reviewText:
New hotel. Great happy hour (well priced and delicious snacks). Good common spaces to work from laptop/read/relax. Very friendly and helpful staff.

Did not like built in shampoo/body wash containers. No minibar/evening service.

managementResponses.response: Glad to hear that you enjoyed the location and the vibe of the Axiom!  We hope to once again host you on your next visit to San Francisco!

review.title: Great location in union square area
review.reviewText: Great locale. Very nice hotel with a hip vibe.  Clean

managementResponses.response: Thank you for choosing the Axiom Hotel for your visit to San Francisco.  We are glad you enjoyed the hotel.  It sounds like we didn't do a good job of communicating with you on the options available for breakfast and I apologize for that.  We actually have the Turn Cafe in the Lobby as well as Room Service available for breakfast, lunch and dinner.  We hope you will return in the future to give us another try!

review.title: Great Location; Great WiFi
review.reviewText: Convenient to BART and Union Square, it's in a great location. Rooms are not large, but adequate and very clean. The overall setup is great for use of electronics, including WiFi that's better than any other hotel I've stayed at.

review.title: Perfect weekend getaway
review.reviewText: We really enjoyed the Axiom. It's location was perfect. First time in San Francisco and spent the weekend exploring the city. The hotel is new and the staff very accommodating. The bed was very comfy and the room clean and well appointed. No problem with noise. Water temp perfect as well as the heat/AC very easy to adjust if needed. Would stay again and recommend to others.

managementResponses.response:

We have worked hard to provide our guests with outstanding accommodations and we appreciate your feedback regarding our comfortable beds and well appointed bathrooms. For your next visit we offer a variety of rooms including rooms with a separate seating area. One of these may be a better fit for you next time. We look forward to serving you again soon and wish you safe travels!

review.title: Great for a weekend in SF
review.reviewText: Overall great hotel for the weekend. Perfect location. Comfortable bed, nice bathroom, relatively quiet. Biggest drawback was the room size. Rooms were tiny.

review.title: Comfortable Bed and a good size room
review.reviewText: Great staff, great size for NYC, nice balcony... Could be a bit cleaner, the floors were pretty dirty, didn't want to take shoes off, but other then that it was great, bed was amazing and super comfortable.
review.positiveRemarks: Staff was helpful and very nice!
review.negativeRemarks: Vacuum rooms better, lots of dust, crumbs, dirt on floors
review.locationRemarks: Can get anywhere you need to in the city quick and easy from this location

review.title: Very nice hotel in a central location
review.reviewText: The hotel was very nice for 4 stars. It was clean, had everything and in a great location. I would definitely stay there again.

review.title: Short trip for family fun
review.reviewText: Amazing location. Amazing comfort. Right at the base of Powell where the cable car turns around. Easy access to Union Square. Restaurants and shops everywhere. Doesn't get any better. Oh yah exit BART at Powell from SFO and you're checking in within 2 minutes.

We look forward to accommodating you again in the future and wish you safe travels!

review.title: Nice, well-designed hotel in the heart of SF
review.reviewText: I had a very good experience at the hotel. It is in the heart of SF, so close to everything.
review.positiveRemarks: Nice, modern clean design. Well-designed rooms. Mine was small but totally functional and perfect for one person traveling for business.
review.locationRemarks: Right at the Powell St. cable car turn-around, so in the heart of SF.

review.title: Great modern hotel right on Union Square
review.reviewText: Lovely comfortable hotel in the perfect location. Cable car outside the door and all great shops within one block

review.reviewText: Its a concept hotel - no front desk. Everything is digital. I stayed for a week on business and my room was very comfortable. Downside - the valet was bad (took 20-30 to get our car).

managementResponses.response:
Dear Anna,

Thank you for sharing your review of your experience with us at Axiom Hotel. We're glad that you found our excellent location in Union Square convenient for public transportation and exploring everything San Francisco has to offer. Our historic yet digitally advanced decor is what our slogan "The Center of Next" is all about and we appreciate your compliments. Thank you for your feedback regarding check in/check out and our Housekeeping Team. We have shared this information with our team so we can address these issues immediately and provide our guests with 100% outstanding service. We look forward to your next visit and wish you a wonderful day!

review.title: Highly recommend
review.reviewText: I've stayed here 3 nights by myself. First time visiting San Francisco and had a great time staying here. Close to public transportation and easily accessible.  Felt safe around this neighborhood, even late at night.
review.positiveRemarks: Great location. Loved the decor of the hotel and the amenities.
review.negativeRemarks: Check in and check out process could be faster. The housekeeping was making rounds too early in the morning (8am).

managementResponses.response:
Dear Casey,

Thank you for sharing your detailed review of your stay with us at Axiom Hotel. We're proud to offer our guests outstanding amenities like complimentary fiber-optic WiFi and device mirroring televisions in our guest rooms. We're glad you had the opportunity to take advantage of these and hope you had a chance to explore our library, arcade area, and fitness center. Our central location in the city is perfect for exploring the sights and enjoying the variety dining and attractions. We are excited that you plan on staying with us again on your next visit and we look forward to serving you!

review.title: Great hip spot right downtown.
review.reviewText: Stayed here for two nights during the week. Beautiful modern styled hotel. Room I booked had 2 beds and the room was surprisingly large for what I would expect in a major city. Bathrooms are gorgeous, water was hot and the towels great. Large TV was wall mounted but on an arm that let you pull out and rotate as needed. Oh, and the TVs have Apple TV's hooked up to them so you can use AirPlay from your iOS devices and watch on the big screen! Bit of construction going on nearby, but I couldn't hear anything from my room. There's a trolley stop right in front of the hotel, so if you want to ride that, it's perfect. Close to shopping and lots of sights nearby. Hotel staff was great when I had to interact with them and were generally pretty quick at getting cars out of valet - though I would call 15 minutes or so ahead if you are in a rush so you don't have to wait. Beds were comfortable, and we had lots of seating in the room. I don't normally leave reviews, but If I'm going back to SF, I'm staying here.
review.positiveRemarks: Great location, very "cool" hotel. As of this writing, it was only a few months old, which played big for me and my want for modern amenities.
review.negativeRemarks: Valet parking is... well, it's not the cheapest, but it's average with what I found for the area. You'll have to look since I can't mention prices.
review.locationRemarks: Great location next to lots of shopping, easy to get onto public transit.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Richy,

Thank you for choosing Axiom Hotel for your accommodations during your Pacific Road Trip! We are glad our central location was fantastic for taking in the local shops and restaurants. Our team appreciates your recommendations to our future guests and we hope to serve you again when travel brings you back to SF. Have a terrific day!

review.title: Pacific Rd Trip
review.reviewText:
Excellent new hotel that I would recommend to anyone in SF, location is a key which is close to best shops and restaurants.

Great rates for San Francisco...

review.reviewText: The experience was great. The inside of the building had a unique feeling and layout. Never seen a hotel with books but I liked it! Also the hotel is up-to-date and appeals to today's tech savvy world.
